alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 17 at 10:02AM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Prairie River near Taconite affecting Itasca County. Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Crow Wing and Morrison Counties. Snake River near Pine City affecting Pine County. Mississippi River At Aitkin affecting Crow Wing and Aitkin Counties. .Additional snow melt will continue to lead to river flooding and elevated flows. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River near Pine City. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, This will cause flooding near Cross Lake near Pine City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Monday was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 05/09/1950. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Snake River Pine City 9.0 9.3 Mon 9 am CDT 9.6 9.7 9.2 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 500 PM CDT.
